document.full_text: california governor jerry brown on monday said the state's economy was on the mend but that california still had a nearly $10 billion budget hole to close and insisted tax hikes were needed.
document.title: california economy "on mend," governor wants tax hikes
lines_and_colors: california governor jerry brown on monday said the state's economy was on the mend but that california still had a nearly $10 billion budget hole to close and insisted tax hikes were needed.
